# Server Rules
These are the main RULES:
1.) Don't be a DICK
2.) Freedom of speech is MANDATED
3.) Admins have final say in the case of a dispute or decision
4.) DO NOT break Federal/State Laws (very important)
5.) Appeals can be made in discord
Secondary rules:
1.) Do your job
2.) Don't intentionally destroy the station or cause harm unless its your role as an antag
3.) Roleplay Moderatley
the Discord can be found here:https://discord.gg/DVTVv5dN
